bug.author: LINYOUWEI0804
bug.description: system:ubuntu18.04 tf:2.0.0b0 python:3.6.9 I want to train a model for object recognition，Then I run [python3 train.py --logtostderr --train_dir=training/ --pipeline_config_path=ssd_mobilenet_v2_quantized_300x300_coco.config] Get this error：AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.data.experimental.ops.optimization' has no attribute 'AUTOTUNE'
